column4: hey, i'm trying to reinitialize my pgp installation... after i installed hp-setup, my pgp system stops working... all i know is that hp-setup imports a pgp key and that seems to screw it up... any idea how i can revert it back to normal?
screw you guys i'm switching to debian
just because you arent getting help right now doesnt mean there is no help out there. Have you tried posting on ubuntuforums.org?
